title: It is taking a considerable amount of time to load the client after a game.
body:
I do have to run the client in low spec mode, so I know its meant to be a little slow when loading back in after a game, but its slow enough to where by the time I get to the end game screen, everyone has already left.

My friends, who don't like to stay in the end game screen for very long, normally have to wait on me to accept the request for the next game, while I can do nothing but stare a spinning blue circle.

So, any advice on what to do?

replies.body: You have also turned on another option when you enabled low spec mode that is causing the after match screen to load slower: close client during game. If you could check you client options and turn that off if it's on, you should be able to see those after match stats much quicker.
